businessProfile.name: Giuseppe's Pizzeria and Catering
businessProfile.address: 554 E Algonquin Rd, Des Plaines, IL 60016, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 554 E Algonquin Rd, Des Plaines, IL 60016, USA

reviews.text: Giuseppe‚Äôs was awesome to work with for our Multicultural Night at Forest Elementary! They were super helpful and made everything easy. Everyone loved their pasta ‚Äî so fresh and flavorful ‚Äî and the garlic rolls were a huge hit. Soft, buttery, and packed with garlic, they disappeared fast! Big thanks to Giuseppe‚Äôs for helping make our event so special. Definitely recommend them for delicious carryout and catering!

Tried the new ultra-thin tavern pizza and it was awesome! How they get it so thin?? Edges were nicely charred, crust was crisp throughout, cheese just right, saucy sauce, classic sausage was savory and generously topped. A Chicago take on St. Louis cracker-style pizza, and Giuseppe's did it right.

Recently moves back to the area and was so excited to see they just moved and didn‚Äôt go out of business. Have always loved this place. This order was mediocre, unfortunately. It was lukewarm when it arrived and I ordered extra sauce only to get what must be light sauce. Very disappointed. I may give them one more chance just based on history, but there are lots of options around.
Pizza was great as usual. The ribs were good, tangy sauce ‚Äì may be a little bit too much. Beef sandwich had a lot of beef and good peppers. Order seemed pricey.

We catered for a birthday, and the food was great! It arrived right on time and was still nice and hot. I first heard about your place from a party I went to that you catered‚Äîthe food there was so good that I decided to go with you. Everything was handled really smoothly and efficiently. We ordered the pasta alla Romana, chicken piccata, and the walnut cranberry salad. There was so much food that we ended up with plenty of leftovers!

editorial_summary.overview: Pizza & Italian entrees dispensed with an old-school feel in a nondescript, strip-mall setting.

recentReviews.text: Amazing Pesto Chicken panini!!! I get it every-time
Everything was delicious and the portions were more than generous. I had baked clams, lasagna, and veal parmesan. I'll give it an A+++ üëç
Never an issue and the food is excellent. Pizza is my go-to, but, sandwiches  pasta and desserts a hit

We catered for a birthday, and the food was great! It arrived right on time and was still nice and hot. I first heard about your place from a party I went to that you catered‚Äîthe food there was so good that I decided to go with you. Everything was handled really smoothly and efficiently. We ordered the pasta alla Romana, chicken piccata, and the walnut cranberry salad. There was so much food that we ended up with plenty of leftovers!
Catered food for my granddaughter‚Äòs second birthday. Everything was outstanding. The fried chicken was gone before I knew. Thank you, Joann and staff.

I've been eating here since the 1990;s when i lived in Des Plaines  at the old location on lee street in the restaurant and delivery and the lunch buffet( which was awesome)  .  Always loved everything here especially their Italian beefs which were always huge. Since moving a little further I've  found them on UberEATS and have been getting Italian beefs the last 2 years (along with pizza etc.) .   I will say the Italian beefs are even better than they were years ago.  Don't know what you're doing but keep it up!.  To me.... this Italian beef is  in a class with some of the best  around Chicagoland and  that is saying something.  Update 8/24/25- another great beef from here.   Do not  sleep on this place for IT. beef's!
Best Pizza in the Des Plaines area. Very reasonable prices as well.
Always good food and good service

detailedReviews.author: Annie Hall-oween
detailedReviews.text: Amazing Pesto Chicken panini!!! I get it every-time

detailedReviews.author: Anna Izrael
detailedReviews.text: Everything was delicious and the portions were more than generous. I had baked clams, lasagna, and veal parmesan. I'll give it an A+++ üëç

detailedReviews.author: Martha Rhodes
detailedReviews.text: Never an issue and the food is excellent. Pizza is my go-to, but, sandwiches  pasta and desserts a hit

detailedReviews.author: Mel M
detailedReviews.text: We catered for a birthday, and the food was great! It arrived right on time and was still nice and hot. I first heard about your place from a party I went to that you catered‚Äîthe food there was so good that I decided to go with you. Everything was handled really smoothly and efficiently. We ordered the pasta alla Romana, chicken piccata, and the walnut cranberry salad. There was so much food that we ended up with plenty of leftovers!

detailedReviews.author: Toni Pierro
detailedReviews.text: I like this place

detailedReviews.author: Jo Ann Belmonte
detailedReviews.text: Catered food for my granddaughter‚Äòs second birthday. Everything was outstanding. The fried chicken was gone before I knew. Thank you, Joann and staff.

detailedReviews.author: pm3181
detailedReviews.text: I've been eating here since the 1990;s when i lived in Des Plaines  at the old location on lee street in the restaurant and delivery and the lunch buffet( which was awesome)  .  Always loved everything here especially their Italian beefs which were always huge. Since moving a little further I've  found them on UberEATS and have been getting Italian beefs the last 2 years (along with pizza etc.) .   I will say the Italian beefs are even better than they were years ago.  Don't know what you're doing but keep it up!.  To me.... this Italian beef is  in a class with some of the best  around Chicagoland and  that is saying something.  Update 8/24/25- another great beef from here.   Do not  sleep on this place for IT. beef's!

detailedReviews.author: TheManInTheBox
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in the Des Plaines area. Very reasonable prices as well.

detailedReviews.author: GARY FORTE
detailedReviews.text: Always good food and good service

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Lehman
detailedReviews.text: The food is always amazing,the prices are great and the staff is friendly,

detailedReviews.author: Bobby Drake
detailedReviews.text: Best food in town..Wings are to die for..

detailedReviews.author: Bob Ugel
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was great as usual. The ribs were good, tangy sauce ‚Äì may be a little bit too much. Beef sandwich had a lot of beef and good peppers. Order seemed pricey.

detailedReviews.author: Rob Kozlowski
detailedReviews.text:
I ordered a 12 inch pizza and some chicken tenders. Chicken tenders were good, but the pizza was garbage. I understand I did not specifically ask for a well dine pizza, but my last interaction with the owner I was told they are all cooked well done.  They were good for a while,  but the last two times I ordered I have to say I am extremely disappointed.  The middle of the crust is barely cooked, just a flabby mess. The cheese is pure white, it should have some color.
The crust us what really gets me though, how can something that undercooked be sent out. 2 times in a row this happened,  I will never order from here again, I dont think there is any decent pizza place in des plaines to be honest. It's sad. I only gave it 2 stars because the chicken tenders were good but that's hard to screw up.

detailedReviews.author: William Powell
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza! Fast delivery! Great experience.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony
detailedReviews.text: The pizza I got was amazing everything about this place was spot on this is gonna be my go to pizza place!!

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Skarbek
detailedReviews.text: Great place to grab take out! The food is reliably good, salads are great, pizza is amazing! Staff is friendly and efficient.

detailedReviews.author: T F
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely amazing food!! Been eating Giuseppe's since 2000 and have never been able to find another pizza that even comes close. I could eat something new on the menu every week and never be disappointed. I can tell they use the best quality ingredients in everything they make and the employees are always super friendly. Hands down my favorite restaurant of all time!!!

detailedReviews.author: Seth Novoselsky
detailedReviews.text: Friendly staff, great pizza, and timely service.

detailedReviews.author: Rick Varga
detailedReviews.text: This is one of the best pizzas in Chicago land.

detailedReviews.author: Ari Braun
detailedReviews.text: I have lived walking distance from this place for going on eight years now and I‚Äôve never had a bad experience. The pizza is excellent and everything else we have tried has been great as well. Lastly - the service is always very welcoming and professional. Support your local businesses people!

detailedReviews.author: Karen Borst
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. Hot and fast delivery Sausage pizza is very good.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Herman
detailedReviews.text: Great little place . Down sized from a great big place but the food stayed and was always good

detailedReviews.author: Don Gill
detailedReviews.text: Great spot always good food

detailedReviews.author: Donna Dzieciol
detailedReviews.text: I never have to ask for extra sausage on the best pizza around.

detailedReviews.author: debbie herman son
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was fresh piping, hot, and fair price

detailedReviews.author: Tom Derengowski
detailedReviews.text: My parents favorite pizza place for decades. Use to be a sit down restaurant but relocated and now take out only. Still the great pizza we have enjoyed all of these many years

detailedReviews.author: Steve Michalak
detailedReviews.text: Always great food and service,  even in new takeout location. Great sause

detailedReviews.author: FA P
detailedReviews.text:
This is strictly take out and catering.  Food is OUTSTANDING!!!!!!!
If desperate,  there is a small window seat area

detailedReviews.author: Kayla Blair
detailedReviews.text: Great place, good prices for the food options. despite them being very busy, they were great about trying to be quick with service while doing many online / phone call orders. The multitasking was insanely good

detailedReviews.author: beatrice williams
detailedReviews.text: Recently moves back to the area and was so excited to see they just moved and didn‚Äôt go out of business. Have always loved this place. This order was mediocre, unfortunately. It was lukewarm when it arrived and I ordered extra sauce only to get what must be light sauce. Very disappointed. I may give them one more chance just based on history, but there are lots of options around.

detailedReviews.author: joanne parise
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food. Service is always the best

detailedReviews.author: Amnart Kamarchevakul
detailedReviews.text: Good local pizza place. Great for movie night or partying foods. And fast delivery.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Bartusiak
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutely awesome beef sandwiches! Generous portions. Kind, friendly staff.
5 stars!!  We love you, Giuseppes! üòÉ

detailedReviews.author: Hugo Botello
detailedReviews.text: Good place for pizza

detailedReviews.author: Kathie Burrus
detailedReviews.text: Always great food. This is my go to place for pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Ruby lebron
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a üçï slice of pepperoni and sausage last 2 times they make it fresh for me best pizza growing up in Chicago jumbo slice is 10 bucks so Good everything on point

detailedReviews.author: LACC Pearson
detailedReviews.text: Great food, always!

detailedReviews.author: MJ Perez
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a month ago from Florida for our Chicago trip in May, the best customer service and the food was great, deep dish,pasta,salad beef dips so good, my Chicago family will be ordering, thank u Joan for everything.

detailedReviews.author: Todd King
detailedReviews.text:
Had pizza, wings, and hand-breaded cheese sticks. We asked for the pizza to be customized slightly. Everything was fantastic; great flavors! The service was friendly and prompt. We overheard the owner releasing the history of the business, going back 65 years to when his grandfather opened it.
This is strictly a carry-out pizzeria, there is no seating for indoor dining.

detailedReviews.author: terrie ivaska
detailedReviews.text:
Our pastas were fantastic
Next will be pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Welter
detailedReviews.text: Ordered pizza for delivery this past Friday night.  Pizza arrived on time, hot and fresh and was fantastic.   Will definitely order from them again in the future

detailedReviews.author: Juan Crespo
detailedReviews.text: Great food. Superb Customer Service! Friendly staff.

detailedReviews.author: Richard jurczak
detailedReviews.text: Had a slice of sausage pizza. Good flavor and a nice size cut.

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Gloede
detailedReviews.text: We chose Giuseppe's to cater our son's birthday and it was an absolute hit.   Almost every single person told me how delicious the food was, specifically the Rigatoni Alla Romana and the garlic rolls.    The delivery driver was early and set up everything for us, making sure we had everything we needed.  We will for sure be using them for more events.  Joanna was great to work with and even followed up after the event to make sure we were satisfied.

detailedReviews.author: Jamie T
detailedReviews.text: Food is always yummy! I love ordering for the holidays. The take and bake meals are such a great value. And the food always gets Rave reviews. Shout out to Mikey P. who always takes great care of us. She‚Äôs the best!

detailedReviews.author: George S (Onesimus)
detailedReviews.text: Honestly, the price and quality is great here. From service is always helpful and nice. Cant recommend enough.

detailedReviews.author: Matt Peebles
detailedReviews.text: Giuseppe‚Äôs was awesome to work with for our Multicultural Night at Forest Elementary! They were super helpful and made everything easy. Everyone loved their pasta ‚Äî so fresh and flavorful ‚Äî and the garlic rolls were a huge hit. Soft, buttery, and packed with garlic, they disappeared fast! Big thanks to Giuseppe‚Äôs for helping make our event so special. Definitely recommend them for delicious carryout and catering!

detailedReviews.author: Google User
detailedReviews.text: This pizza was the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had the first time I tried it. Last night my pizza literally tasted like nothing. Did you guys change a recipe? Possibly leave out seasonings? It was the most bland pizza I‚Äôve ever tasted. I don‚Äôt regret buying much but I really regretted choosing this as dinner last night. More than likely wont be coming back

detailedReviews.author: Emily Tomczyk
detailedReviews.text: Unfortunately, the food is bland, watery, and soggy. I got the calamari, eggplant Parmesan with garlic bread and was disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Rick Goode
detailedReviews.text: I had major dental work done so I need to eat soft food for a week. so I went there and got their mostacholi meat sauce and meatballs and it was incredible The sauce is incredible I don't care if you were dining in at a fancy restaurant or take out place the meat sauce is out of this world.

detailedReviews.author: Khuslen Amg
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was decent, but nothing spectacular. The crust was a little too doughy for my liking, and the toppings were a bit sparse.  It wasn't bad, just not memorable.

detailedReviews.author: Larry Pearson
detailedReviews.text: love the barbeque chicken pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Phred DeBraun
detailedReviews.text: It's take out and delivery only, but the food is delicious. Try their new tavern style pizza. It's excellent!

detailedReviews.author: Denise Smith Rodd
detailedReviews.text: Tried the new ultra-thin tavern pizza and it was awesome! How they get it so thin?? Edges were nicely charred, crust was crisp throughout, cheese just right, saucy sauce, classic sausage was savory and generously topped. A Chicago take on St. Louis cracker-style pizza, and Giuseppe's did it right.

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Klingaman
detailedReviews.text: Super hot and extra cheezy

detailedReviews.author: blkhwkbob
detailedReviews.text:
Decent tasting pizza, but a little pricey. $18.00 for a 12" sausage pizza is pretty high. I guess there are coupons out there but I didn't have one. Also, owners, trust me, your fried mushrooms are really not good. They have no taste and are mushy. Also pricey at $8.  I get them all over and these were blah.
I didn't hate the place, but Des Plaines has other options that are a little better. Just my opinion.

detailedReviews.author: Paul S.
detailedReviews.text: We had Giuseppe‚Äôs cater our Christmas Eve Dinner. We wanted it extra special because our relatives came in from Italy for the Holidays. This was our first experience with Giuseppe‚Äôs Catering, and I guarantee, it won‚Äôt be our last! What a marvelous spread they served us. There really was no favorites, because all of it was our favorite. Thank you to all at this great place for making our Holiday a wonderful experience we won‚Äôt soon forget.

detailedReviews.author: Manish Patel
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food.   This is our go to for catering.   Fresh and delicious.  Highly recommend.   Ask for Sal!

detailedReviews.author: dawn diesi
detailedReviews.text:
Joanna (sorry if I misspelled!) Is awesome. Great customer service and dinners are LARGE and worth every penny. They put love in their food! Come on peeps! Support our local GREAT family restaurants! Ask for Joanna. She's a sweetheart

++++update+++++. Nove 24 and still rocking Strong! Let them make the money to deliver. F doordash and all those. Call them!

detailedReviews.author: Laura Miller
detailedReviews.text: Spinach lasagna is the best!! Great people with great service!

detailedReviews.author: Jim K
detailedReviews.text: Check your pizza before you leave. Giuseppe's is usually solid. Sometimes the bottom can be a little soggy; but this time it looks like somebody stuck their finger in the middle and played with the cheese after it came out. I was too hungry and didn't feel like going out to call and complain. I'll just check the pizza before waking out next time.

detailedReviews.author: Dan Laramie
detailedReviews.text:
The pizza by the slice is awesome. Took my boy here and he loved it - he was going to get the pepperoni, but I explained to him that Giuseppe's has the best sausage around.

Safe to say, he agreed.

detailedReviews.author: Kingmecca
detailedReviews.text: Love this place, great service, nice atmosphere. Love the italian beefs

detailedReviews.author: Anna
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutely  delicious  pizza,there large size pizza is bigger  ,then  extra large in many places.
I totally  recommend  this place to everyone.
Bit priced, but it's so worth it.

detailedReviews.author: AnnMarie Biancalana
detailedReviews.text:
We order from here all the time and the food is always 10/10. Pizza is amazing, so is everything else I‚Äôve ordered from the menu. The gluten free options are amazing as well!!
Definitely recommend.

detailedReviews.author: T. A. W.
detailedReviews.text: It's like the places under new management food is completely different...

detailedReviews.author: Melisa Maris
detailedReviews.text: the food was amazing, the service was amazing, this is my new comfort food place.

detailedReviews.author: Irwin Roque
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza and staff are great. Shoutout to Martina and Milan for exceptional service

detailedReviews.author: Jess S.
detailedReviews.text:
We were happy about finally find a place with a delicious vegan gluten free pizza and we had been ordering during the week and we didn‚Äôt have problems before.
Today, Saturday (August 10) we decided to get another one, when I opened the box I could see that whoever made this one was a different person because added some different vegetables like red pepper and something that I wasn‚Äôt able to recognize.
Then I ate two pieces and I had a horrible diarrhea my husband almost took me to the emergency‚Ä¶ (I am lactose intolerant). Unfortunately we found pieces of cheese under the filling and this was not difficult to find as there was a good amount of cheese! I really don‚Äôt think it was an accident because of the way and amount of the cheese we found. We took some pictures and videos‚Ä¶

I may be wrong about who made this pizza, but it seems to be a different person by the way it was organized and the different ingredients on the pizza because I had bought cheeseless veg pizza-gluten free for dinner before.
But today was the last time!

detailedReviews.author: Sean Johansson
detailedReviews.text: My entire family got food poisoning after eating a Cheese pizza üçï from here. Never again‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: Tricia Paterakos
detailedReviews.text: I discovered Giuseppe's after doing some research on catering options for my parent's surprise anniversary celebration. I am so grateful I selected them ‚Äì everything was seamless, from the food order to the delivery. In addition, Joanna was incredibly helpful. From the jump, she talked me through a menu for the party AND followed up with me after the event to ensure everything went smoothly. And the food was incredible. We received SO many compliments (many people asking, "what IS this place?") and were so pleased with the variety of options. I can't wait to use them for our next big event!

detailedReviews.author: Gi Keats
detailedReviews.text: Great service, delivery was fast, food was still hot. We ordered the standard for a group - cheese, sausage and peperoni pizzas. The surprise was the 100% vegan pizza option. WOW! it was the first one the group finished. Weve tried vegan pizza from other places and this was the BEST!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Sam Gaylord
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Baker
detailedReviews.text: We absolutely love this place. The pizza is the best in town! We are continuing to work through the menu! The poppers were some of the best I‚Äôve ever had as well. Crispy and delicious. We highly recommend this meal and will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Kemling
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was so good!  We got half cheese, half pineapple for the kids, and a G-special. Usually we order from Tortorice‚Äôs, but I think we have our new regular spot.

detailedReviews.author: Jesse Carrera
detailedReviews.text: This place is great, and they have Coke Zero now!

detailedReviews.author: Kiko1996 Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: I use to get pizza here all the time when I was younger. Now, I live a bit outside of Denver and miss this place. Their pizza is bomb! Absolutely delicious.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the generous portions and excellent quality of dishes like Italian beefs and pizza, often highlighting them as the best in the area. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The catering service is highly appreciated for its punctuality, smooth handling, and delicious food, making it a popular choice for events. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and efficient staff contribute significantly to the positive dining experience, making customers feel welcome and valued. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Consistent issues with undercooked or bland food and incorrect orders (e.g., undercooked pizza, bland taste, incorrect toppings) - review management can address this concern
Perception of high prices and lack of awareness of available promotions - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Concerns about food safety and quality consistency (e.g., food poisoning, unexpected ingredients) - social media marketing can improve this area

negative.text: Unfortunately, the food is bland, watery, and soggy. I got the calamari, eggplant Parmesan with garlic bread and was disappointed.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
